issue.title: [Java/Python]  Add unit test for pyarrow.decimal128 in Array.from_jvm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2606](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2606). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up after https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2249. We need to find the correct code to construct Java decimals and fill them into a `DecimalVector`. Afterwards, we should activate the decimal128 type on `test_jvm_array` and ensure that we load them correctly from Java into Python.
